name: Checkers with Mario Physics
description:
This fan game is inspired from the animation by level up.

Check out the original video!!!

It is a 2 player game. So, you can also bring your friend along.

This game is very similar to Level UP's video but not completely same as it maybe missing some stuff.

I'm may add other stuff too. So, stay tuned!

This game is MADE WITH GODOT.
